bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of mental or emotional derangement. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry gen dang zi 茛菪子：療 癲狂風癇，顛倒拘攣 , “It cures peak-illness with madness and wind epilepsy, as well as peak inversion with cramps and contraction”.

②Inverted position of any item. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry xiong 熊：好攀緣，上高木，見人 則顛倒自投地而下 , “They love to climb and move up high in trees. When they notice humans they throw themselves head first down to the ground”.
